comment.author: 12648435@N04
comment._content: Wonderful stuff! I'm very happy that the State Library of New South Wales is uploading parts of their collection, it is a great service to Australians and all people world wide.

comment.author: 26801567@N00
comment._content: mistranslatedcap I agree... I'm also glad to see some of the collection up here on flickr. Cheers!

comment.author: 41311545@N05
comment._content: I couldn't agree more. Every page  is a delight, and it is wonderful that the public can at last access these records of their history. Sam Hood's photographic  map of the life of Sydney in the first half of the 20th Century is  simply stunning.  Well done SLNSW.

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Don't forget that even more information is available from the State Library of NSW website www.sl.nsw.gov.au/
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
